plays.text: Penalty to Sami Helenius 2 minutes for Tripping Stanislav Chistov
Goal scored by Chris Simon assisted by Sami Helenius and Theo Fleury
Penalty to Vitaly Vishnevski 2 minutes for Hooking Steve Sullivan
Goal scored by Petr Sykora assisted by Steve Rucchin and Sandis Ozolinsh
Penalty to Keith Carney 2 minutes for Tripping Eric Daze
Penalty to Steve Sullivan 2 minutes for Slashing Niclas Havelid
Penalty to Petr Sykora 2 minutes for Roughing Steve Poapst
Penalty to Keith Carney 2 minutes for Holding Steve Sullivan
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Stanislav Chistov
Goal scored by Stanislav Chistov assisted by Steve Rucchin and Paul Kariya
Goal scored by Theo Fleury assisted by Chris Simon and Igor Korolev
Goal scored by Steve Sullivan assisted by Steve Poapst and Nathan Dempsey
Penalty to Nathan Dempsey 2 minutes for Holding Paul Kariya
Goal scored by Paul Kariya assisted by Petr Sykora and Niclas Havelid
Goal scored by Samuel Pahlsson assisted by Niclas Havelid and Rob Niedermayer
